description: An informative magazine all about rifles and shooting.  There is an excellent article about proper maintenance in this issue.

variants.description: An informative magazine all about rifles and shooting.  There is an excellent article about proper maintenance in this issue.
A monthly shooting and firearms publication, with lot of articles and comments.
Annual magazine for marksmen, with lots of articles and papers, as well as reviews of new rifles, optics, and mods.

A dedicated journal about various firearms, their usage, and news about them.  Different articles review new firearm models, old models, new attachments, hunting, maintenance, and a lot of other topics.

description: A hefty military field manual about automatic rifle usage and techniques which improve marksmanship and proper weapons-handling.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 23-16 Army marksmanship manual

variants.description: A hefty military field manual about automatic rifle usage and techniques which improve marksmanship and proper weapons-handling.

name.str: SAS and Elite Forces Guide Sniper
name.str_pl: copies of SAS and Elite Forces Guide Sniper

variants.description: An unofficial guide about the work and skills of British and NATO snipers.  There are a lot of photos of weapons and equipment, but it has a huge lack of details - the most important information is just mentioned or described without any value.

name.str_pl: copies of Precision Rifle Marksmanship: The Fundamentals

variants.description: A small book about using the rifle as a marksman tool.  There is plenty of info, but it is too general, and the author talks more about his experience as a sniper instead of sniping itself.

name.str: Precision Long Range Shooting And Hunting
name.str_pl: copies of Precision Long Range Shooting And Hunting

variants.description: The basics of long-range shooting in fairly simple language.

name.str_pl: copies of The Marine Sniping Handbook

variants.description: The Official (or at least so it says) marksmanship guide for scout snipers.  With lots of essential info, it gives a pretty good foundation to anyone who knows how to use a rifle.
Reprint of a 1917 book about rifle shooting and maintenance.  It is surprisingly detailed, and contains lots of information, even if the language is fairly old-fashioned.

name.str_pl: copies of Rifle Shooting for Beginners

variants.description: A guide to shooting sports that explains the basics of equipment usage, judging distance, aiming, breathing, movement, and trigger discipline alongside a lot of another essential info.

name.str: Great Hunting Rifles: Victorian to the Present
name.str_pl: copies of Great Hunting Rifles: Victorian to the Present

variants.description: A history of some of the most exquisite rifles made in the twentieth century, with lots of love and details.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-22.9: Rifle Marksmanship M16-/M4- Series

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual which provides guidance for training with the 5.56-millimeter M16-series rifle and M4 carbine.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-22.68: Crew-Served Machine Guns 5.56-mm And 7.62-mm

variants.description: An official U.S. Army manual which is a comprehensive guide about using the M240 and M249 crew-served machine guns, with excellent examples and a lot of theory.
Different training methods for carbine users from world champion shooters, aimed toward civilians, law enforcement, and military shooters.

name.str_pl: copies of The Art of the Rifle

variants.description: This book covers the fundamentals of rifle shooting, including stance, grip, sight alignment, and trigger control.

name.str: Shooter's Bible Guide to Rifle Ballistics
name.str_pl: copies of Shooter's Bible Guide to Rifle Ballistics

variants.description: A comprehensive guide to the principles of rifle ballistics, including information on bullet types, trajectory, and wind drift.

A giant, 500 page history of the AK-47 - the most popular firearm in the world - and the information around it: the mechanic of the weapon, the usage, maintenance, modification, and its impact on global conflict.
